title: BBC Blast Studio type ID help
content:
Hey guys, can anyone help me identify this type?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/time_4333.jpg)

You can view a chunk of it here too: [http://blastgetcreative.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223303/http:/blastgetcreative.co.uk/ "http://blastgetcreative.co.uk/")

Any help is appreciated, thanks!
author: pixelcraft

comments.content:
Hi Kevin,

looks like [Typ 1451](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223303/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Typ1451/) by [Nico Schweizer](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223303/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nico%252BSchweizer).  
F
